title: How Puzzles Improve Your Brain: The Surprising Science of the Pl
description:
How Puzzles Improve Your Brain: The Surprising Science of the Playful Brain


English | ISBN: 0285641751 | 2013 | EPUB, MOBI, PDF | 304 pages | 52,3 MB

If you want to enhance your brain performance regular mental exercises, including crosswords and Sudoku (even brain training computer games), can help to improve memory, fine motor skills, logic and visual observation. Solving different types of mental exercises helps the brain to improve itself, as well as heightening imagination and creativity skills. Packed with illuminating insights and dozens of witty and, often, perplexing puzzles, How Puzzles Improve Your Brain can create a healthier brain while explaining how the puzzles are changing it. In How Puzzles Improve Your Brain Scott Kim, a puzzle master, has designed puzzles that can target, and improve, specific areas of the brain while Richard Restak, a leading neuroscientist, describes the science behind how they reshape and strengthen the brain.
